SqlOutput.Sql: (((COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))/CAST(POWER(CAST((CAST(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18)), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) AS DECIMAL(38,10))) * CAST(POWER(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)) AS DECIMAL(38,10)))

SqlOutput.Sql: ((($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c * $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c)/CAST(POWER(CAST((CAST($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c AS VARCHAR)) AS DECIMAL(38,18)), $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) AS DECIMAL(38,10))) * CAST(POWER($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, $!s0s!$.customnumber3__c) AS DECIMAL(38,10)))
